Html:
I am having an issue when trying to send an email to "Registered Users" this on on V2 and here is what i can getting. Any help would be great.



Line 375: Public Default ReadOnly Property Item(ByVal index As Integer) As MemberInfoRow

Line 378: End Get
Line 379: End Property

Hi,

I have the same problem have someone allready an answer for this problem.
Please let us Know

Hi,

I solved the problem in the web.config I chanced

<add key="ClubMailServer" value="192.168.1.199" />
<add key="ClubMailUsername" value="" />
<add key="ClubMailPassword" />
to

<add key="ClubMailServer" value="192.168.1.199" />
<add key="ClubMailUsername" value="" />
<add key="ClubMailPassword" value=""/>

Now it is working good
